name: study-notion
description: Study Notion Clone is a web-based Learning Management System (LMS) built using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack. It provides a feature-rich environment for users to explore courses, manage profiles, and engage in learning activities. The project incorporates various functionalities, including user authentication, OTP generation, course catalog, instructor dashboards, and more.

scripts.build: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
